dcterms:creator: P. Whittle
dcterms:description: The Whittle index policy is a scheduling policy for restless bandits that utilizes indices to prioritize actions based on marginal rewards.
dcterms:title: Whittle index policy

dcterms:creator: F. Robledo
V. Borkar
U. Ayesta
K. Avrachenkov
dcterms:description: The Whittle index-based Q-learning (WIQL) is a reinforcement learning approach that approximates the Whittle indices for scheduling in restless bandits.
dcterms:title: Whittle index-based Q-learning (WIQL)

dcterms:creator: K. E. Avrachenkov
V. S. Borkar
dcterms:description: The AB learning policy is a reinforcement learning approach designed for restless bandits, focusing on average reward optimization.
dcterms:title: AB learning policy

dcterms:creator: A. Biswas
G. Aggarwal
P. Varakantham
M. Tambe
dcterms:description: The Greedy policy is a straightforward approach that selects actions based on the highest expected instantaneous rewards.
dcterms:title: Greedy policy

dcterms:creator: J. Fu
Y. Nazarathy
S. Moka
P. G. Taylor
dcterms:description: Circulant dynamics refer to a specific structure of state transitions in restless bandits that can be modeled using circulant matrices.
dcterms:title: Circulant dynamics

dcterms:creator: K. E. Avrachenkov
V. S. Borkar
dcterms:description: Homogeneous smart targets tracking involves tracking multiple targets that exhibit similar dynamics and behaviors.
dcterms:title: Homogeneous smart targets tracking

dcterms:creator: K. E. Avrachenkov
V. S. Borkar
dcterms:description: Heterogeneous smart targets tracking refers to tracking multiple targets that exhibit different dynamics and behaviors.
dcterms:title: Heterogeneous smart targets tracking
